rows.label: qev086804_MSG0001
rows.name:
This is the place. According to this,
selenean sage grows in this cave.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0002
rows.name: And Celica's already in there, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0003
rows.name: What the matter? Rock scared?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0004
rows.name: N-no, I'm not...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0005
rows.name:
There's nothing to be ashamed of, Rock.
I'm no fan of spooky caves either, believe me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0006
rows.name:
It's just...some bad people used to make me
do some very bad things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0007
rows.name:
They always kept me in a dark, cramped place
when they took me around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0008
rows.name:
This must be hard for you, huh?
You can wait outside if it's easier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0009
rows.name: N-no, I'll go. I have to help Celica.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_JNK0010
rows.name: Assure

rows.label: qev086804_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell Rock that you've got things
covered if he wants to stay.

rows.label: qev086804_JNK0020
rows.name: Support

rows.label: qev086804_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you'll protect the both of them.

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0010
rows.name: I can't. Celica must be just as scared as me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0011
rows.name: I can't run off and leave her behind![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0012
rows.name: That's very brave of you, Rock.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0013
rows.name:
If it comes to combat, we'll keep you safe
so you can focus on Celica, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0014
rows.name: All right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0015
rows.name: That's really nice, but I can't ask you to do that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0016
rows.name: I have to help Celica myself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0017
rows.name:
Rock, we WANT to help you,
the same way you want to help her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0018
rows.name:
And accepting help from your friends
doesn't make you any less of a hero.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0019
rows.name: I guess you're right... Okay, then![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0020
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086804_MSG0021
rows.name:
This nothing. Rock just need to be brave like Tatsu,
and everything fine. Now let's go find pretty lady![ST:wait ]
